ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron awnsered Iron Raptor s stern question, probably not with the kind of seriousness he should have. He leaned over the consol, closer to the screen. Why

Subject: Re: IR
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron awnsered Iron Raptor's stern question, probably not with the kind
of seriousness he should have. He leaned over the consol, closer to the
screen. "Why simply to talk my dear Iron Raptor." He said in a largely non
carring tone, like this situation was trivial to him. "It seems that I have
risen through the ashes, to rule again, and you are a neighbouring force on
this planet. I simply want to be on good terms." He said smilling a broad
elequant smile. "And I wanted to give you the best greeting I could." as he
finished this sentence, he carefully and slowly moved towards a button on
his computer. He pressed it, sending the signal to Autofire. "You've
already met Motormaster" he said pointing to the grim looking Stunticon
comander, "I simply wish you to meet some more of my soldiers. Please, show
them the same kind of courtious, I showed you." he with a highly sarcastic
tone.
